# galaxy_mysql_catalog (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `id` (String) A catalog connecting to MySQL

### Read-Only

- `catalog_id` (String) MySQL catalog identifier (read only)
- `cloud_kind` (String) MySQL cloud kind. Defaults to AWS.
- `connection_type` (String)
- `description` (String) Catalog description
- `host` (String) MySQL host
- `name` (String) Catalog name
- `password` (String) MySQL database password
- `port` (Number) MySQL database port. Defaults to 3306.
- `private_link_id` (String) PrivateLink Identifier
- `read_only` (Boolean) Is catalog read only
- `ssh_tunnel_id` (String) SSH tunnel identifier
- `username` (String) MySQL database username
- `validate` (Boolean) Validate catalog configuration before creation
